name: Ted Ginn: Kick Return
description:
Make clutch plays:
- Find holes, follow blocks, and break tackles!
- Tiptoe the sidelines on your way to the end zone!
- Practice real football strategy like reading blocks!
- Earn time bonuses for getting into field goal range!
- Compete in increasingly challenging tournaments!

Manage your team:
- Upgrade your returners, blockers!
- Customize your field and uniforms!

Win huge prizes:
- Earn bonuses for touchdowns and wins!
- Massive payouts for tournament wins!
- All prizes DOUBLED on Sundays!


Claim your team today!
